error.signature: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference

verdict.summary: Dereferencing a nil pointer. Common with uninitialized structs, failed type assertions, and error-ignored returns.

dead_ends.action: Add nil check before every pointer use
dead_ends.why_fails: Defensive checks everywhere obscure the real bug

dead_ends.action: Use recover() to catch the panic
dead_ends.why_fails: Masks the bug, doesn't fix the nil source

workarounds.action: Find where the nil value originates â€” check error returns, interface assertions, and struct init
workarounds.how: Use stack trace to find the exact line. Check: (1) err != nil before using result, (2) val, ok := x.(Type) before using val, (3) struct field initialization in constructors

workarounds.action: Use the comma-ok pattern for type assertions and map lookups
